entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1001002 - Statement - Estado de situaci√≥n financiera, orden de liquidez (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bankinter-2021-12-31:GarantiasFinancierasConcedidas, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaAdquiridoEnArrendamiento, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion3, bankinter-2021-12-31:CompromisosDePrestamosConcedidos, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion5, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPasivosSubordinados, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion4, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPasivosSubordinadosACosteAmortizado, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion2, bankinter-2021-12-31:OtrosCompromisosConcedidos, bankinter-2021-12-31:ProMemoriaCapitalNoExigido, bankinter-2021-12-31:DeLosCualesFondoDeLaObraSocialSoloCajasDeAhorrosYCooperativasDeCredito All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1006003 - Statement - Estado del resultado global, de resultados, por naturaleza del gasto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bankinter-2021-12-31:DeLosCualesDotacionesObligatoriasAFondosDeLaObraSocialSoloCajasDeAhorrosYCooperativasDeCredito All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,300,544,000 reported in the network role http://www.bankinter.com/role/EstadodelresultadoglobalcomponentesORIpresentadosantesdeimpuestosStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 1,333,108,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bankinter.com/role/EstadodecambiosenelpatrimonionetoStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20211231-es.zip/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20211231-es/reports/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20211231-es.xhtml 1271
